summary: THE ENGINE STALLED WITHOUT WARNING.  *JB  THE VEHICLE STALLED AT LOW SPEEDS WITHOUT WARNING.  THE DEALER FOUND NO PROBLEM.  A FLIGHT RECORDER WAS INSTALLED.  THE ENGINE WOULD STALL AT A LIGHT, RESTART, THEN STALL AGAIN AT A LOW SPEED.  THE CONSUMER REQUESTED TO BE RELEASED FROM THE LEASE AT NO CHARGE.  (THERE IS A TSB FOR THE IDLE)  SCC
